name: Reindeer Munch
author: Melinda Johnson
summary: Easy and fun to make this snack with the kids. Ideal replacement to the cookies for Santa!
ingredients: 2 cups crispy rice cereal squares (such as Rice Chex®)
1 cup candy-coated milk chocolate pieces (such as M&M's®)
1 (12 ounce) package white vanilla baking chips
directions: Stir cereal squares, pretzel sticks, peanuts, and milk chocolate pieces together in a large bowl
Melt the vanilla baking chips in a microwave-safe glass or ceramic bowl in 30-second intervals, stirring after each melting, for 1 to 3 minutes (depending on your microwave)
Drizzle melted chips over cereal mixture
Pour mixture out onto a large piece of aluminum foil and cool for 30 minutes
